biotools.summary:
A comprehensive database for SNPs and disease-related variations in miRNAs and miRNA targets.

Welcome to the miRNASNP -v3 database.

microRNAs (miRNAs) are endogenous and regulatory non-coding RNAs by targeting mRNAs for cleavage or translational repression. SNPs in pre-miRNAs or target sites will affect miRNA expression or function. miRNASNP is a comprehensive resource of human miRNA-related SNPs, including their effects on target gain and loss.
